ygData.subject: Re: PK & Binding?
ygData.msgSnippet: A -PVP cannot bind a +PVP. One way to circumvent this is to bind them at an arena, or any other +PVP area. In the Name of Ro, Damoin Wizard of the 4th Circle
ygData.messageBody:
A -PVP cannot bind a +PVP. One way to circumvent this is to bind them at an
arena, or any other +PVP area.

In the Name of Ro,
Damoin
Wizard of the 4th Circle
----- Original Message -----
From: <jeff_belcher@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 2:34 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] PK & Binding?


> From: jeff_belcher@...
>
> I know PK's can't be healed by non-PKs, but I was wondering if the same
thing held for binding. Does anyone know if a non-PK can bind a PK?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Gantorek <Clan Cathar> of the Povar Server
>
